title: The Kind-hearted Caterpillar
hook: What will happen when a curious caterpillar discovers its wings are different from others?
moral: Kindness can bring out the best in others, differences are what make us unique.
paragraphs: In a lush garden filled with colorful flowers and buzzing bees, lived a little caterpillar named Ruby. All her friends had ordinary wings, but Ruby's wings were a dazzling shade of purple, shimmering in the sunlight.

One day, while playing with her friends, Ruby's unique wings caught the attention of a group of mischievous butterflies. They started teasing her, calling her "odd" and "strange". Ruby felt sad and didn't understand why her friends were laughing at her.

Feeling upset, Ruby retreated to a quiet corner of the garden. A wise old ladybug named Lily noticed Ruby's distress and approached her. Lily gently told Ruby, "Your wings may be different, but they are beautiful and special in their own way."

Encouraged by Lily's kind words, Ruby gained confidence and returned to her friends. When the bullying butterflies teased her again, Ruby responded with a warm smile and showed them kindness. Surprised by Ruby's positivity, the butterflies apologized and even complimented her wings.
From that day on, Ruby's friends learned to appreciate and celebrate her unique wings, and the garden became a place where kindness and acceptance blossomed.
keywords: caterpillar, wings, unique, kindness, differences, garden, friendship, acceptance, positive, beauty

en-de.title: Die Freundliche Raupe
en-de.moral: Freundlichkeit kann das Beste in anderen hervorbringen, Unterschiede sind es, die uns einzigartig machen.
en-de.hook: Was passiert, wenn eine neugierige Raupe entdeckt, dass ihre Flügel anders sind als die der anderen?
paragraphs:
In einem grünen Garten voller bunter Blumen und summender Bienen lebte eine kleine Raupe namens Ruby. Alle ihre Freunde hatten gewöhnliche Flügel, aber Rubys Flügel waren in der Sonne glitzernd, in einem funkelnden lila Farbton.
An einem Tag, als sie mit ihren Freunden spielte, fielen Rubys besondere Flügel einer Gruppe von schelmischen Schmetterlingen auf. Sie begannen, sie zu ärgern, nannten sie "komisch" und "seltsam". Ruby fühlte sich traurig und verstand nicht, warum ihre Freunde über sie lachten.
Fühlend traurig, Ruby zog sich in eine leise Ecke des Gartens zurück. Eine kluge alte Marienkäferdame namens Lily bemerkte Rubys Kummer und näherte sich ihr. Lily sagte Ruby sanft, "Deine Flügel mögen anders sein, aber sie sind auf ihre eigene Weise schön und besonders."
Mut gemacht durch Lilys freundliche Worte, bekam Ruby Mut und kehrte zu ihren Freunden zurück. Als die beleidigenden Schmetterlinge sie wieder ärgerten, antwortete Ruby mit einem warmen Lächeln und zeigte ihnen Freundlichkeit. Überrascht von Rubys Positivität, entschuldigten sich die Schmetterlinge und lobten sogar ihre Flügel.
Seit diesem Tag haben Rubys Freunde gelernt, ihre einzigartigen Flügel zu schätzen und zu feiern, und der Garten wurde ein Ort, an dem Freundlichkeit und Akzeptanz erblühten.

en-fr.title: La Chenille Au Cœur Gentil
en-fr.moral: Être gentil peut rendre les autres heureux, nos différences font de nous des êtres uniques.
en-fr.hook: Que se passera-t-il lorsque une chenille curieuse découvrira que ses ailes sont différentes des autres ?
paragraphs:
Dans un beau jardin rempli de fleurs colorées et d'abeilles bourdonnantes, vivait une petite chenille nommée Ruby. Tous ses amis avaient des ailes ordinaires, mais les ailes de Ruby étaient d'un éclatant violet, scintillant au soleil.
Une fois, en jouant avec ses amis, les ailes uniques de Ruby ont attiré l'attention d'un groupe de papillons espiègles. Ils ont commencé à se moquer d'elle, en l'appelant "étrange" et "bizarre". Ruby s'est sentie triste et n'a pas compris pourquoi ses amis riaient d'elle.
Se sentant contrariée, Ruby se retira dans un coin tranquille du jardin. Une gentille coccinelle sage nommée Lily remarqua la détresse de Ruby et s'approcha d'elle. Lily dit gentiment à Ruby, "Tes ailes peuvent être différentes, mais elles sont belles et spéciales à leur manière."
Encouragée par les gentils mots de Lily, Ruby a gagné en confiance et est retournée vers ses amis. Quand les papillons moqueurs l'ont taquinée à nouveau, Ruby a répondu avec un sourire chaleureux et leur a montré de la gentillesse. Surpris par la positivité de Ruby, les papillons se sont excusés et ont même complimenté ses ailes.
Depuis ce jour-là, les amis de Ruby ont appris à aimer et célébrer ses ailes uniques, et le jardin est devenu un endroit où la gentillesse et l'acceptation fleurissaient.

en-pt.title: A Lagarta Bondosa
en-pt.hook: O que vai acontecer quando uma lagarta curiosa descobre que suas asinhas são diferentes das dos outros?
en-pt.moral: Ser gentil pode fazer com que as pessoas mostrem o melhor delas, as diferenças são o que nos tornam únicos.
paragraphs:
Num lindo jardim cheio de flores coloridas e abelhas zumbindo, morava uma pequena lagarta chamada Ruby. Todos os amigos dela tinham asas comuns, mas as asas de Ruby eram de um deslumbrante tom de roxo, brilhando sob a luz do sol.
Certa vez, enquanto estava brincando com suas amigas, as asas únicas de Ruby chamaram a atenção de um grupo de borboletas travessas. Elas começaram a provocá-la, chamando-a de "estranha" e "diferente". Ruby se sentiu triste e não entendeu por que suas amigas estavam rindo dela.
Sentindo-se chateada, Ruby se retirou para um cantinho calmo do jardim. Uma sábia joaninha chamada Lily percebeu a aflição de Ruby e se aproximou dela. Lily disse gentilmente para Ruby, "Suas asas podem ser diferentes, mas são lindas e especiais do seu jeito."
Influenciada pelas palavras gentis de Lily, Ruby ganhou confiança e voltou para suas amigas. Quando as borboletas valentonas a provocaram novamente, Ruby respondeu com um sorriso caloroso e mostrou gentileza. Surpresas pela positividade de Ruby, as borboletas pediram desculpas e até elogiaram suas asas.
A partir desse dia, os amigos da Ruby aprenderam a admirar e celebrar suas asas únicas, e o jardim se tornou um lugar onde a bondade e a aceitação floresceram.

id-en.title: The Kind-hearted Caterpillar
paragraphs:
In a beautiful garden full of pretty flowers and busy bees, there was a small caterpillar named Ruby. While her friends had regular wings, Ruby's wings were a bright purple color that sparkled in the sun.
Once upon a time, Ruby was having fun with her friends when some cheeky butterflies noticed her special wings. They began making fun of her, saying mean things like "weird" and "different". Ruby was upset and didn't know why her friends were giggling at her.
Feeling sad, Ruby went to a calm spot in the garden. A clever old ladybug named Lily saw Ruby sad and came close. Lily softly said to Ruby, "Your wings may look different, but they are pretty and unique in their own way."
Ruby felt better and bravely faced the butterflies. She was nice to them, even when they were not nice to her.
Since that day, Ruby's friends started to like and have fun with her special wings, and the garden turned into a spot where being nice and agreeing grew.
